Uses of Package
uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc

  • Packages that use uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc  
    uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc.collectors  
    uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc.processors  
  • Classes in uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc used by uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc 
    Class Description
    BatchCollector
    ## The Batch Collector A batch collector is a container of methods to manage matches during the operations of BatchProcessor.
    BatchProcessor
    ## Batch Processor Skeleton A simple skeleton to manage processing of data in multi-thread mode.
    ItemizedBatchCollector
    A batch collector that can be populated one item at a time.
    SizedBatchCollector
    A batch collector such that the batch ready flag can be based on a batch size and a max size parameter.
  • Classes in uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc used by uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc.collectors 
    Class Description
    AbstractSizedBatchCollector
    A default scaffolding SizedBatchCollector, which has a getter for AbstractSizedBatchCollector.maxBatchSize() and a default value for it.
    BatchCollector
    ## The Batch Collector A batch collector is a container of methods to manage matches during the operations of BatchProcessor.
    ItemizedBatchCollector
    A batch collector that can be populated one item at a time.
    ItemizedSizedBatchCollector
    A common type of batch collector which manages a flow of items as input and which considers the batch full when it has accumulated a given number of items.
    SizedBatchCollector
    A batch collector such that the batch ready flag can be based on a batch size and a max size parameter.
  • Classes in uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc used by uk.ac.ebi.utils.threading.batchproc.processors 
    Class Description
    BatchProcessor
    ## Batch Processor Skeleton A simple skeleton to manage processing of data in multi-thread mode.
    ItemizedBatchProcessor
    ## Item-based batch processor.
